title: PHPob_get_clean()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPob_get_clean()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Store the contents of an output buffer in a variable:
<?php
ob_start();
echo "Hello World!";
$contents = ob_get_clean();
echo "The contents of the buffer are: ";
echo $contents;
?>

Definition and Usage
The
ob_get_clean()
function returns the contents of the output buffer and then deletes the
contents from the buffer.
Syntax
ob_get_clean();
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns a string containing the contents of the buffer
PHP Version:
4.3+

★
+1
